titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford Alumi Association, Alumni reminiscences
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Correspondence between Jack W. Shoup, secretary of the Alumni Association, and alumni concerning memories of Senator and Mrs. Stanford (1955-1956), which included attending parties at the Stanford home, Mr. Stanford observing work on Encina Hall, Mrs. Stanford observing work on Memorial Church, Mrs. Stanford visiting Roble Hall, their attendance at Sunday Chapel on campus, and Mrs. Stanford's funeral.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Stanford Alumi Association, Alumni Reminiscences (SCM0284). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence between Jack W. Shoup, secretary of the Alumni Association, and alumni concerning memories of Senator and Mrs. Stanford (1955-1956), which included attending parties at the Stanford home, Mr. Stanford observing work on Encina Hall, Mrs. Stanford observing work on Memorial Church, Mrs. Stanford visiting Roble Hall, their attendance at Sunday Chapel on campus, and Mrs. Stanford's funeral.
